name: Social Media Sentiment Analysis
postCreateCommand: pip install -r requirements.txt && python -c 'import ssl; import nltk; ssl._create_default_https_context = ssl._create_unverified_context; nltk.download("punkt_tab"); nltk.download("punkt"); nltk.download("stopwords"); nltk.download("wordnet"); nltk.download("omw-1.4"); nltk.download("vader_lexicon")'
